app_description: An AI-powered web application to practice coding interviews across multiple domains.
select_domain: Select the domain you want to practice
explore_domain: Explore the domain you want to conquer in your interview!
domain_backend_desc: Build robust, scalable backend systems and APIs.
domain_frontend_desc: Create beautiful, interactive web user experiences.
domain_devops_desc: Optimize development, deployment, and operations processes.
domain_security_desc: Protect systems and data from threats.
domain_datascience_desc: Analyze and leverage data to create value.
domain_aiml_desc: Apply AI and Machine Learning in practice.
domain_game_desc: Create engaging and immersive gaming experiences.
domain_cloud_desc: Design and implement scalable cloud infrastructure and services.
domain_blockchain_desc: Develop decentralized applications and blockchain solutions.
domain_iot_desc: Build connected devices and IoT applications.
domain_qa_desc: Ensure software quality through testing and automation.
domain_uiux_desc: Design intuitive, attractive, and user-friendly digital products.
domain_graphic_desc: Create images, posters, and brand identities.
domain_business_strategy_desc: Drive growth and innovation with smart business strategies.
domain_hr_desc: Develop people and build strong teams.
domain_legal_desc: Analyze and evaluate legal frameworks and real-world cases.
domain_medical_desc: Diagnose and solve complex medical problems.
domain_teaching_desc: Develop effective teaching methods and educational strategies.
domain_curriculum_desc: Design and implement educational programs and materials.
domain_visual_arts_desc: Create compelling visual content across different mediums.
domain_performing_arts_desc: Express creativity through performance and entertainment.
domain_research_desc: Conduct scientific research and analyze findings.
domain_applied_science_desc: Apply scientific principles to solve real-world problems.
